alert.note: Alert for Marion (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 25 at 2:16PM CDT until June 25 at 3:00PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Morristown has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Marion County in east Tennessee... * Until 300 PM CDT. * At 216 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Cowan, or 11 miles southeast of Winchester, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Jasper, South Pittsburg, Kimball, Monteagle, Orme, Fiery Gizzard State Park, Foster Falls State Park and New Hope. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
